LanguageData.R3_TableHarvesting.label: harvesting table
LanguageData.R3_TableHarvesting.description: A worktable to harvest parts & implants from deceased creatures & mechanoids. Benefits from being placed near a refurbishment table.
LanguageData.R3_TableRefurbishment.label: refurbishment table
LanguageData.R3_TableRefurbishment.description: A worktable to refurbish and clean reclaimed parts & implants. Benefits from being placed near a harvesting table.
